description:
This market will resolve to “Yes” if the Binance 1 minute candle for MATIC/USDT titled "2022/10/14 12:00" in the ET timezone (referring to 12:00 PM ET) has a final “Close” price of 0.8251 or higher, or to “No” otherwise.

The resolution source for this market is https://www.binance.com, specifically the MATIC/USDT “Close” prices currently available at https://www.binance.com/en/trade/MATIC_USDT?theme=dark&type=spot with “1m” and “Original” selected on the top bar. To see the “Close” prices, mouse over particular candles and look at the value after “Close:” at the top of the chart.

The API url https://api.binance.com/api/v3/klines?symbol=MATICUSDT&interval=1m with relevant startDate and endDate parameters may be used in the event that the chart is unavailable. Please note that this market is about the price according to Binance MATIC/USDT, not others sources or spot markets.
title: Will the price of Polygon ($MATIC) be above $0.825 on October 14?
